ABOUT ME

Try to know me a little more :)




Personal Profile

Have over 10 years’ experience in developing IT solutions
and want to take part in a major role in helping the company expand.
Furthermore, I’m British and I can speak my mother language
(Chinese- Cantonese) with a full clean UK licence.

Tech stacks

Net Core MVC, REST API, SQL Server, TeamCity, GitLab, GitHub, WCF,
RabbitMQ, Team Foundation, Tortoise SVN and SQL Reports.

Programming languages

C#, HTML, CSS, SQL, VB, XML and JavaScript.

Hobbies / Interest

I am interested into a variety of sports and occasionally organise activates
for friends and family like Aerial Extreme, Go Karting, paint balling, etc.
In my free time I enjoy programming, cooking, watching movies, surfing the internet
and socialising.
